name: ! The Last of the Phoenicians
body: ### ! The Last of the Phoenicians Many writing systems that we use today descended directly from the right-to-left "abjad" (no vowels) created by Phoenicians in 1050 BC. * alf ("ox") **Ê¾ [Ê”]** 10900 => alpha Î‘Î± 1 => Aa * bet ("house") **b [b]** 10901 => beta Î’Î² 2 => Bb * gaml ("camel") **g [É¡]** 10902 => gamma Î“Î³ 3 => Gg, Cc * delt ("door") **d [d]** 10903 => delta Î”Î´ 4 => Dd * he ("window") **h [h]** 10904 => epsilon Î•Îµ 5 => Ee * wau ("hook") **w [w]** 10905 => upsilon Î¥Ï… 400, digamma ÏœÏÏ› 6 => Ww Yy Uu Vv, Ff * zai ("weapon") **z [z]** 10906 => zeta Î–Î¶ 7 => Zz * het ("wall") **á¸¥ [Ä§]** 10907 => eta Î—Î· 8 => Hh * tet ("wheel") **á¹­ [tË¤]** 10908 => theta Î˜Î¸, 9 * yod ("hand") **y [j]** 10909 => iota Î™Î¹ 10 => Ii, Jj * kaf ("palm") **k [k]** 1090A => kappa ÎšÎº 20 => Kk * lamd ("goad") **l [l]** 1090B => lambda Î›Î» 30 => Ll * mem ("water") **m [m]** 1090C => mu ÎœÎ¼ 40 => Mm * nun ("serpent") **n [n]** 1090D => nu ÎÎ½ 50 => Nn * semk ("fish") **s [s]** 1090e => xi ÎžÎ¾ 60, chi Î§Ï‡ 600 => Xx * ain ("eye") **Ê¿ [Ê•]** 1090F => omicron ÎŸÎ¿ 70), omega "Î©Ï‰(800)" => Oo * pe ("mouth") **p [p]** 10910 => pi Î Ï€ 80 => Pp * sade ("hunt") **á¹£ [sË¤]** 10911 => san ÏºÏ» * qof ("needle head") **q [q]** 10912 => koppa Ï˜Ï™ÏŸ 90, phi Î¦Ï† 500, psi Î¨Ïˆ 700 => Qq * rosh ("head") **r [r]** 10913 => rho "Î¡Ï(100)" => Rr * shin ("tooth") **Å¡ [Êƒ]** 10914 => sigma "Î£ÏƒÏ‚(200)" => Ss * tau ("mark") **t [t]** 10915 => tau "Î¤Ï„(300)" => Tt Numbers * one 1 10916 * ten 10 10917 * twenty 20 10918 * one-hundred 100 10919 * two 2 1091A * three 3 1091 Punctuation * word-separator 1091F Language Code * Phnx * 115 * phn more info on the [Greek](http://language.github.com/greek) Page.
